dpk::RotatorControl

dpk::RotatorControl Class Reference

A rotator control object simulates the axis of an instrument or image rotator. More...

Detailed Description

A rotator control object simulates the axis of an instrument or image rotator.

virtual tpk::Trajectory dpk::RotatorControl::axis2enc ( const tpk::Trajectory  axis  )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Convert rotator axis trajectory to encoder trajectory.

The default implementation converts from degrees to arcsec.

Parameters:
axis  axis position

virtual tpk::Trajectory dpk::RotatorControl::enc2axis ( const tpk::Trajectory  enc  )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Convert encoder trajectory to axis trajectory.

The default implementation converts from arcsec to degrees.
